title: Israel’s Bold, Risky Attack - The Atlantic

metaData.description: The Israeli campaign may be necessary, but preventive wars carry great moral and practical risks.
metaData.krux:title: Israel’s Bold, Risky Attack - The Atlantic
metaData.krux:description: The Israeli campaign may be necessary, but preventive wars carry great moral and practical risks.
metaData.author: Tom Nichols
metaData.og:title: Israel’s Bold, Risky Attack
metaData.og:description: The Israeli campaign may be necessary, but preventive wars carry great moral and practical risks.
metaData.FacebookShareMessage: In Israel’s actions against Iran, it is “removing the source of a threat by surprise, on their own timetable and on terms they find favorable,” Tom Nichols writes. “They may be justified in doing so, but such actions carry great moral and practical risks.”
metaData.TwitterShareMessage: In Israel’s actions against Iran, it is “removing the source of a threat by surprise, on their own timetable and on terms they find favorable,” Tom Nichols writes. “They may be justified in doing so, but such actions carry great moral and practical risks.”
